snippet.title: Running past 'Mile 20' for Boston
snippet.description:
* Seven months of marathon training have made my 30-year-old knees feel like those of a person decades older. At times, I've hobbled down stairs and winced unexpectedly. If I owned a cane, I'd shake it at the trim women who run past me while pushing strollers full of infants -- and the gazelle-ish teens who spring by at two...
http://www.cnn.com/2013/11/06/opinion/sutter-marathon-mile-20/index.html

snippet.title: Radcliffe suffers Olympic build-up blow
snippet.description:
* World record holder Paula Radcliffe has withdrawn from next month's Flora London Marathon with a toe tendon injury suffered at her training base in the United States.
http://www.cnn.com/2008/SPORT/03/06/athletics.radcliffe/index.html

snippet.title: North Korean leader begins rail trip to Moscow
snippet.description:
* North Korean leader Kim Jong-il has crossed into Russia's Far East to start a marathon train journey to Moscow for a meeting with President Vladimir Putin.
http://www.cnn.com/2001/WORLD/asiapcf/east/07/25/russia.korea.north/index.html

snippet.title: Do anti-pollution car bans actually work?
snippet.description:
* Running along the banks of the Seine Sunday, I take a lap around the giant hot air balloon in the south of Paris hovering gently over the Parc Andr√© Citroen.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/03/19/travel/paris-pollution-car-ban/index.html

snippet.title: How to make sure your first marathon isn't your last
snippet.description:
* At this point in my life, at the wizened age of 69, I've managed to run 123 marathons \-- and I'm happy to say I'm still going strong.
http://www.cnn.com/2012/08/24/health/complete-first-marathon-tips/index.html

snippet.title: Don Riddell: Running into trouble
snippet.description:
* So I've got just under 11 weeks to go until the Flora London Marathon and I've encountered something of a hitch.
http://www.cnn.com/2006/SPORT/02/09/don.marathon/index.html

snippet.title: NYC Marathon runners find their own way to run -- and give back
snippet.description:
* With slightly more than 36 hours to go before the 2012 ING New York City Marathon, Mayor Michael Bloomberg canceled the annual event, amid criticisms the runners would be siphoning off valuable resources needed in the city's recovery from Superstorm Sandy.
http://www.cnn.com/2012/11/05/health/nyc-marathon-runners-time/index.html

snippet.title: Gadgets, Web sites to make you a better runner
snippet.description:
* Admit it, runners: When you're on the fifth mile of your fourth run of the week and there's nothing but you, the summer heat and 5 more miles to go, things can get a bit ... boring.
http://www.cnn.com/2009/TECH/07/29/running.tech.gadgets/index.html
